person.persName: Don Carlos Buell (General & Muhlenberg Iron Operator)

body.p: Civil War General. Georgia native. Married to Margaret Hunter Mason Buell. Graduated United States Military Academy in 1841. Served in t Mexican-American War as a first lieutenant and a captain. Assistant Adjutant General from 1848-1849. Promoted to Lietuenant Colonel and then brigadier general. Commanded Department of the Ohio from November 1861 to October 1862. Resigned from the United States Army on June 1, 1864. President of the Green River Iron Co from 1865.
